revised_title: Solar Flare Plasma Dynamics and Energy Release Mechanisms
tldr: This article discusses the three phases of solar flares: energy storage, energy release, and dissipation. It explores the storage of flare energy in the solar magnetic field and the impulsive release of this energy, as well as the dispersion and dissipation of high-energy particles produced. The article also considers the theoretical modeling of flares and the limitations imposed by current observations.
